## Ticker.offNextTick() method

De-registers a fn to be called on the next tick.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
offNextTick(fn: ICallback): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | ICallback | The function to be de-registered. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
